projects.name: Personal Job Matching Agent
bullets: Designed an automated job matching system using NLP, Python, and cosine similarity scoring.
Achieved 91.44 percent accuracy in sentence importance classification using a custom-trained NLP model.
Scraped and normalized job descriptions from multiple company career portals at scale.
Implemented rule-based NLP pipelines to extract skills, responsibilities, and role-specific keywords.
Built a sentence classification model to identify impactful resume and job description statements.
Trained TF-IDF models on 86K+ job description sentences to enhance semantic matching and keyword weighting.
Integrated LLM-based reasoning for final job suitability scoring and explainable match insights.
Developed ATS-friendly resume generation pipeline using LaTeX templates and Python automation.
Matched candidate profiles against job requirements using semantic similarity and weighted scoring.
Optimized text preprocessing with stemming, stopword removal, and domain-specific token filtering.
Designed modular architecture enabling easy integration of new models and scoring strategies.

projects.name: Bunk-Bites (Canteen Management System)
bullets: Built a full-stack canteen management system using Next.js, TypeScript, Neon with Drizzle ORM.
Implemented REST APIs for authentication, order management, payments, and role-based access control.
Integrated Razorpay payment gateway and Redis for fast OTP system.
Deployed live application capable of handling 100K+ requests/day with real-time order processing.
Configured CI/CD with GitHub Actions enabling automatic deployments to Vercel and Cloudflare Workers.

projects.name: Burger Web-App
bullets: Designed full-stack burger ordering system using MVC architecture, Express and MongoDB Atlas
Implemented session-based authentication with Passport.js and role-based access
Built interactive UI for creating, editing, and deleting custom burger orders
Developed RESTful APIs using Express for filtering, listing, cart, and request management
Created middleware for authorization including isLoggedIn and isValidListingUser for secure operations
Integrated Cloudinary for image and file uploads with secure storage handling
Implemented dynamic routing for listings, filters, and user requests using Express Router
Enabled order actions including accept, decline, and add-to-cart with protected routes

projects.name: AI Object Classifier
bullets: Designed Python-based dominant color classification system using HSV pixel mapping algorithm
Processed real-time IP webcam streams using OpenCV for continuous image acquisition
Implemented pixel-wise HSV range checks to identify and count dominant object colors
Applied background removal using rembg library to improve foreground color accuracy
Optimized color detection by filtering noise and normalizing image frames
Built modular Python pipeline for preprocessing, masking, and dominant color computation

projects.name: Student Performance Predictor
bullets: Built linear regression model achieving 98.83 percent prediction accuracy using scikit-learn
Trained and evaluated model on dataset containing over 2,000 student performance records
Performed data preprocessing including feature selection, normalization, and train-test splitting
Developed RESTful Flask API to serve real-time prediction results
Integrated Next.js frontend with Flask backend for seamless data flow
Implemented form validation using Zod and React Hook Form to reduce invalid submissions
Deployed backend on Render and frontend on Vercel ensuring scalable and reliable access
Designed end-to-end ML pipeline from data input to live prediction output
